00001 @class ExtoreDelicious ;
00002 
00003 // del.icio.us gives all times in UTC, implied.
00004 // The time zone is not embedded in the date format
00005 // So, in order to get correct times from NSDate methods, we
00006 // append the timezone name "UTC" and append it to the date format...
00007 #define DELICIOUS_DATE_FORMAT @"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ"
00008 #define AUGMENTED_DATE_FORMAT @"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ%Z"
00009 #define STANDARD_DATE_FORMAT nil // Use NSCalendarDate standard format, @"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S %z"
00010 #define DELICIOUS_TIME_ZONE_NAME @"UTC"
00011 
00012 @interface DeliciousParser : NSObject {
00013     NSXMLParser* _parser;
00014     NSData* _data;
00015         
00016         BOOL _insertDates ;
00017         BOOL _insertPostsAndTags ;
00018         BOOL _insertBundles ;
00019         int _debugCount ; 
00020         
00021         ExtoreDelicious* _extore ;  // weak
00022         NSString* _browfileIdentifier ;
00023         NSCalendarDate* _lastUpdateTime ;
00024         NSError* _error ;
00025 }
00026 
00027 + (BOOL) parseData:(NSData*)data
00028           postsAndTags:(BOOL)insertPostsAndTags
00029                          dates:(BOOL)insertDates
00030                    bundles:(BOOL)insertBundles
00031                          extore:(ExtoreDelicious*)extore
00032         lastUpdateTime:(NSDate**)lastUpdateTime
00033                          error:(NSError**)error ;
00034 
00035         // If no errors, returns YES.
00036         // Otherwise, returns NO and sets error to an autoreleased NSError*
00037 @end
